item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: Hi, I’m Dom. Welcome to my first blog post! My main objective for this blog is to start documenting my work more. Having had completed some small side projects and interning at some companies, I found that it was difficult to remember certain quirks and details of my past work. Writing blog posts to store this knowledge will hopefully remedy this issue. The tech stack I used to set up this blog is quite straightforward.
